faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q5: Is it easy to implement Host Helper AI?
faq.a5: Yes, implementation is very simple. Our team will guide you through the entire process and you will have your AI agents up and running in less than 24 hours.
faq.a6: We offer a free personalized demonstration where you can see how the AI agents work with your own data and specific use cases.
faq.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time on a prorated basis.
faq.q3: In which languages is the assistant available?
faq.a3: The assistant is available in multiple languages, with the ability to automatically detect the guest's language and respond appropriately in their native language.
faq.q4: How does the extra income system work?
faq.a4: The assistant proactively offers additional services to your guests, such as transfers, show tickets, or restaurant reservations, generating commissions for you.
faq.a7: All plans include email technical support. Pro and Enterprise plans also include priority support and access to a dedicated account manager.

promoVideo.subtitle: Create your AI agents in minutes, no technical knowledge required

step1.title: 1. Register and add your property
step1.description: Create your account in minutes and add the details of your property. Upload photos, description and accommodation rules.

step2.title: 2. Configure your AI agents
step2.description: Customize chatbot responses, accommodation information and additional services you want to offer.

step3.title: 3. Share the phone number with your guests
step3.description: Provide our AI agents' phone number to your guests. Our agent takes care of everything with complete access to property information and reservation details.

cta.title: Join property owners who are automating their management
cta.subtitle: Save time, increase your income and improve guest satisfaction.

meta.title: Intelligent AI Agents - Host Helper AI
meta.description: 24/7 phone support for your accommodations with intelligent AI agents that handle calls, coordinate with maintenance teams, and provide personalized recommendations to your guests.

hero.title: Intelligent AI Agents
hero.subtitle: 24/7 Phone Support for Your Accommodations
hero.description: Our AI agents handle phone calls 24 hours a day, manage incidents in real time and coordinate with maintenance or cleaning teams. Integrated with WhatsApp and Telegram to send multimedia information, locations and links. When they need help, they collaborate with each other or escalate to your human team.

phoneService.title: Intelligent Phone Support
phoneService.description: Your guests call a phone number and have voice conversations with our AI agents. Available 24 hours, they understand multiple languages and resolve queries instantly.

multichannel.title: WhatsApp & Telegram Integrated
multichannel.description: During calls, agents send images, locations, links and documents via WhatsApp or Telegram. They combine voice conversation with multimedia content instantly.

teamwork.title: Intelligent Teamwork
teamwork.description: When an agent cannot resolve something, it collaborates with other specialist agents or escalates to your human team. They can coordinate with maintenance or cleaning teams during the same call.

features.title: Capabilities of Our AI Agents
features.subtitle: Reduce your workload while your guests receive professional attention 24 hours a day.

multilingual.title: Natural Multilingual Conversation
multilingual.description: They converse by voice like humans in Spanish, English, French, German and more languages. They understand accents and context to provide accurate responses.

maintenanceCoordination.title: Coordination with Maintenance Teams
maintenanceCoordination.description: During the call with the guest, they can simultaneously contact plumbers, electricians or cleaning teams. They coordinate appointments and confirm with the guest in real time.

intelligentEscalation.title: Intelligent Escalation
intelligentEscalation.description: When they cannot resolve something, they collaborate with specialist agents or transfer the call to your team with full conversation context.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
personalizedRecommendations.description: They know your area perfectly and send restaurant photos, location maps, booking links and personalized recommendations via WhatsApp based on guest preferences.

demo.subtitle: Real Practical Case
demo.title: Example: Plumbing Issue
demo.description: Discover how our AI agents resolve real incidents step by step, coordinating with maintenance teams during the same guest call.

step1.title: Guest calls:
step1.description: No hot water in the apartment

step2.title: Diagnosis and escalation:
step2.description: The agent understands the problem and unable to resolve it transfers the call to a specialist agent who contacts the plumber directly

step3.title: Specialized coordination:
step3.description: The specialist agent explains the breakdown to the plumber with all details and schedules the repair appointment

step4.title: Guest confirmation:
step4.description: The plumber will arrive tomorrow at 10:00. I'm sending you their details via WhatsApp

meta.title: Check-in Automation - Host Helper AI
meta.description: Automate traveler registration according to Spanish regulations (SES) and optimize the check-in process, saving time for your guests and reducing your administrative burden.

hero.title: Check-in Automation
hero.subtitle: Benefits of Automated Registration
hero.description: Simplify traveler registration according to Spanish regulations (SES) and optimize the check-in process, saving time for your guests and reducing your administrative burden.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: Automatically comply with Spanish traveler registration regulations (SES) without worries or risk of penalties for non-compliance.

timeSaving.title: Time Saving
timeSaving.description: Reduce management time by up to 90%. The registration process that used to take hours is now completed in minutes without your intervention.

experience.title: Better Experience
experience.description: Provide your guests with a modern and smooth digital experience that they can complete before arrival, facilitating a hassle-free check-in.

features.title: Features and Capabilities
features.subtitle: Our check-in automation system is specifically designed to comply with Spanish regulations and optimize the management of tourist accommodations.
features.description: Our check-in automation system is specifically designed to comply with Spanish regulations and optimize the management of tourist accommodations.

sesIntegration.title: SES Integration
sesIntegration.description: Direct connection with the Interior Ministry's SES system, ensuring compliance with Spanish traveler registration regulations.

customForms.title: Customizable Forms
customForms.description: Adapt registration forms to your brand and style, including all mandatory fields according to current regulations.

documentCapture.title: Document Capture
documentCapture.description: Allows guests to securely upload photographs of their identity documents before arrival.

reservationManagement.title: Reservation Management
reservationManagement.description: Manual creation or automatic import of reservations from Airbnb, Booking and other platforms, keeping all data synchronized.

demo.subtitle: See in action
demo.title: Simplified Check-in Process
demo.description: Our system automates the entire traveler registration process, from data collection to SES submission, saving you time and avoiding errors.

capabilities.dataCollection: Automatic data collection from reservations on Airbnb, Booking and other platforms
capabilities.links: Sending personalized links to guests to complete their registration

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We protect your personal information with the highest security standards

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L., we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information when using our website www.hosthelperai.com and our services.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content:
â€¢ Identity: ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L.
â€¢ Tax ID: B22732358
â€¢ Postal address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga
â€¢ Phone: +34 687472327
â€¢ Email: support@hosthelperai.com

processingPurposes.title: Data Processing Purposes
processingPurposes.content:
At ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. we process the information provided by interested parties in order to:

â€¢ Manage the sending of information requested through contact forms.
â€¢ Provide and manage the services contracted by our clients.
â€¢ Improve your user experience on our website.
â€¢ Provide interested parties with offers of products and services of their interest, provided we have their explicit consent.
â€¢ Use aggregated and anonymized data derived from conversations to train, validate and improve the Artificial Intelligence models that power our Services, with the aim of improving their accuracy and efficiency.
â€¢ Comply with legal, tax and accounting obligations that apply to us.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
The legal basis for processing your data varies according to purpose:

â€¢ Contract performance: For the provision of services you contract with us.
â€¢ Data subject consent: For sending commercial communications and using non-essential cookies.
â€¢ Legitimate interest: To improve our services, including training our AI models anonymously, and for fraud prevention.
â€¢ Legal obligation: For compliance with tax, accounting and other regulations.

dataProcessor.title: ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. as Data Processor
dataProcessor.content: When our clients use our messaging services, they process personal data from their own end users. In this context, the client acts as Data Controller and ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. acts as Data Processor. Our obligations as Data Processor are regulated through a specific Data Processing Agreement (DPA) that is signed with each client, in compliance with Article 28 of the GDPR.

retentionPeriod.title: Data Retention Period
retentionPeriod.content: The personal data provided will be retained as long as the business relationship is maintained or its deletion is not requested by the interested party. Once the relationship ends, they will be kept blocked for the periods necessary to comply with applicable legal obligations.

recipientsTransfers.title: Recipients and International Transfers
recipientsTransfers.content: Data will not be transferred to third parties except in cases where there is a legal obligation. To provide our Services, we may rely on technology providers (sub-processors), such as cloud hosting services. If any of these entities is located outside the European Economic Area, we ensure that such international data transfers are carried out with adequate guarantees, such as adherence to the EU-US Data Privacy Framework or signing Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission.

userRights.title: Data Protection Rights
userRights.content:
Any person has the right to obtain confirmation about whether ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. is processing personal data concerning them. Interested parties have the right to:

â€¢ Request access to personal data relating to the data subject.
â€¢ Request their rectification or deletion.
â€¢ Object to processing.
â€¢ Request limitation of their processing.
â€¢ Request data portability.

To exercise your rights you can contact us through our email support@hosthelperai.com, attaching a copy of your identity document to verify your identity.

**Data Deletion**: For detailed information on how to request complete deletion of your personal data, including the specific process, timelines and confirmation codes, please see our Data Deletion Procedure available at: www.hosthelperai.com/data-deletion

securityMeasures.title: Security Measures
securityMeasures.content: ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. has implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration and destruction.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies to improve the functionality of our website, analyze its use and offer personalized content. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.

Types of cookies we use:
â€¢ Necessary cookies: Essential for the functioning of the site, such as user authentication and session management.
â€¢ Analytical cookies: Allow us to collect information about how users interact with our site (for example, Google Analytics) to improve our services.
â€¢ Personalization cookies: Allow us to remember your preferences, such as language or region.
â€¢ Advertising cookies: Used to show you relevant ads based on your interests.

Cookie management: You can accept, reject or configure your cookie preferences through the cookie banner that appears when visiting our website. You can also manage cookies in your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

Third parties: Some cookies are installed by third parties, such as Google Analytics, to analyze site traffic. These third parties may collect data independently, and we recommend reviewing their privacy policies for more information.

For more details, consult our Cookie Policy or contact us at support@hosthelperai.com.

policyUpdates.title: Privacy Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We reserve the right to modify this policy. Any changes will be published on this Website. We recommend reviewing it periodically.

termsConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsConditions.subtitle: Conditions governing the use of our services
termsConditions.generalInfo: These terms and conditions govern the use of the Host Helper AI platform. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms in their entirety.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter, "Terms") govern access to and use of the website www.hosthelperai.com (hereinafter, "the Website") and the services offered by Iterator dataworks sl (hereinafter, "HostHelperAI" or "the Owner"), as well as the contracting of said services. Navigation through the Website and/or contracting of services grants the status of user (hereinafter, "User" or "Client") and implies full and unreserved acceptance of all provisions included in these Terms, which may be modified as indicated in the corresponding section.

identification.title: Owner Identification
identification.content:
In compliance with Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI), it is reported that the owner of the Website is:

â€¢ Identity: Iterator dataworks sl
â€¢ VAT: B22732358
â€¢ Address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga, Spain
â€¢ Phone: 687472327
â€¢ Email: support@hosthelperai.com

object.title: Purpose
object.content:
These Terms aim to regulate:

â€¢ Access and use of the Website by Users.
â€¢ Contracting of automated messaging services and customer service solutions offered by HostHelperAI through the Website.
â€¢ Rights and obligations of HostHelperAI and Users/Clients within the framework of service provision.

websiteUse.title: Website Use
websiteUse.content:
4.1. Usage Rules

The User commits to using the Website, its contents and services in accordance with:
â€¢ Current legislation, particularly GDPR, LSSI, and the General Law for the Defense of Consumers and Users (LGDCU).
â€¢ These Terms.
â€¢ Good customs and public order.

The User is obligated not to use the Website for illicit purposes, contrary to these Terms, harmful to third-party rights, or that may damage, disable, overload or deteriorate the Website or the services offered.

4.2. User Registration

To access certain services, such as contracting messaging solutions, the User must register through the form available on the Website, providing truthful, accurate and updated data. The User is responsible for safeguarding their access credentials and will immediately notify HostHelperAI of any unauthorized use of their account.

4.3. Prohibitions

It is expressly prohibited to:
â€¢ Reproduce, distribute or modify Website contents without authorization.
â€¢ Use services to send illegal, offensive content or that infringes third-party rights.
â€¢ Interfere with Website operation through malicious software or any action that compromises its security.

servicesOffered.title: Services Offered
servicesOffered.content:
Host Helper AI offers automated messaging services based on artificial intelligence for managing customer communications, including:

â€¢ Personalized automatic responses.
â€¢ Analysis and improvement of customer experience.

Specific details of each service, including features and prices, are available on the Website.

contractingProcess.title: Contracting Process
contractingProcess.content:
6.1. Contracting Steps

The service contracting process is carried out through the Website and consists of the following steps:
â€¢ Selection of the desired plan or service.
â€¢ Registration or login to the User account.
â€¢ Introduction of billing data and, if applicable, integration with external platforms.
â€¢ Selection of payment method.
â€¢ Contracting confirmation by accepting these Terms.

6.2. Pre-contractual Information

Before confirming the contracting, the Client will receive clear information about:
â€¢ Main service features.
â€¢ Total price, including taxes.
â€¢ Accepted payment methods.
â€¢ Contract duration and renewal or cancellation conditions.

6.3. Confirmation

Once the contracting is confirmed, the Client will receive an email with the order summary, accepted Terms and corresponding invoice.

pricesPayment.title: Prices and Payment Methods
pricesPayment.content:
â€¢ Prices: Service prices are indicated on the Website in euros (â‚¬) and include applicable taxes (e.g., VAT). HostHelperAI reserves the right to modify prices, notifying any change in advance.

â€¢ Payment methods: The following methods are accepted:
- Credit/debit card.
- Bank transfer.
- Other methods indicated on the Website.

â€¢ Billing: Invoices will be issued according to the chosen billing cycle (monthly, annual, etc.) and will be sent to the email address provided by the Client.

compliance.title: Compliance with Obligations
compliance.content: Host Helper AI commits to providing contracted services with maximum diligence and professionalism, complying with established quality standards and maintaining service availability as agreed in the contracted plan.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Host Helper AI will not be responsible for damages that may arise from incorrect use of the service, service interruptions due to force majeure, or the use of information provided by third parties. Liability will be limited to the amount paid for the service in the corresponding period.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual and Industrial Property
intellectualProperty.content: All Website contents (texts, images, software, designs, trademarks, logos, etc.) and the services offered are the property of HostHelperAI or its licensors. The User does not acquire any exploitation rights over said contents beyond what is necessary for the use of the Website and contracted services. Reproduction, distribution or modification of these contents without express authorization is prohibited.

dataProtection.title: Personal Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
HostHelperAI processes personal data of Users and Clients in accordance with its Privacy Policy (available at www.hosthelperai.com). In summary:

â€¢ Data is collected to manage services, improve user experience and comply with legal obligations.
â€¢ Data will not be transferred to third parties except for legal obligation or with Client consent.
â€¢ Clients can exercise their rights of access, rectification, deletion, opposition, limitation and portability by contacting support@hosthelperai.com.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The Website uses cookies to improve user experience and provide personalized functionalities. By using the website, the user accepts the use of cookies as described in our Cookie Policy.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Legislation
applicableLaw.content:
These Terms are governed by Spanish legislation, particularly:

â€¢ Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).
â€¢ Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI).
â€¢ Royal Legislative Decree 1/2007, of November 16, approving the consolidated text of the General Law for the Defense of Consumers and Users (LGDCU).
â€¢ Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5, on Personal Data Protection and guarantee of digital rights (LOPDGDD).

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: For dispute resolution, the parties submit to the courts and tribunals of the city of MÃ¡laga, Spain, waiving any other jurisdiction that may correspond to them.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: HostHelperAI may modify these Terms at any time, publishing the updated version on the Website. Modifications will take effect from their publication, and Clients with active contracts will be notified by email. Continued use of the Website or services implies acceptance of the new Terms.

For any inquiries about these Terms, contact us at:

â€¢ Postal address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga, Spain
â€¢ Phone: 687472327

effectiveDate.content: These Terms take effect on July 24, 2025 and remain in force until their modification or repeal.

severability.content: If any provision of these Terms were declared null or inapplicable by judicial or administrative resolution, the rest of the provisions will maintain their full validity and effectiveness.

The User is obligated not to use the Website for illicit purposes, contrary to these Terms, harmful to third-party rights, or that may damage, disable, overload or deteriorate the Website or the services offered.

4.2. User Registration
To access certain services, such as contracting messaging solutions, the User must register through the form available on the Website, providing truthful, accurate and updated data. The User is responsible for safeguarding their access credentials and will immediately notify HostHelperAI of any unauthorized use of their account.

4.3. Prohibitions
It is expressly prohibited to:
â€¢ Reproduce, distribute or modify Website contents without authorization.
â€¢ Use services to send illegal, offensive content or that infringes third-party rights.
â€¢ Interfere with Website operation through malicious software or any action that compromises its security.

servicesOffered.title: Services Offered
servicesOffered.content:
Host Helper AI offers automated messaging services based on artificial intelligence for managing communications with clients, including:

â€¢ Personalized automatic responses.
â€¢ Analysis and improvement of customer experience.

Specific details of each service, including features and prices, are available on the Website.

contractingProcess.title: Contracting Process
contractingProcess.content:
6.1. Contracting Steps
The service contracting process is carried out through the Website and consists of the following steps:
â€¢ Selection of the desired plan or service.
â€¢ Registration or login to the User account.
â€¢ Introduction of billing data and, if applicable, integration with external platforms.
â€¢ Selection of payment method.
â€¢ Confirmation of contracting by accepting these Terms.

6.2. Pre-contractual Information
Before confirming contracting, the Client will receive clear information about:
â€¢ Main service characteristics.
â€¢ Total price, including taxes.
â€¢ Accepted payment methods.
â€¢ Contract duration and renewal or cancellation conditions.

6.3. Confirmation
Once contracting is confirmed, the Client will receive an email with the order summary, accepted Terms and corresponding invoice.

pricesPayment.title: Prices and Payment Methods
pricesPayment.content:
â€¢ Prices: Service prices are indicated on the Website in euros (â‚¬) and include applicable taxes (e.g., VAT). HostHelperAI reserves the right to modify prices, notifying any changes in advance.

â€¢ Payment methods: The following methods are accepted:
  - Credit/debit card.
  - Bank transfer.
  - Other methods indicated on the Website.

â€¢ Billing: Invoices will be issued according to the chosen billing cycle (monthly, annual, etc.) and sent to the email provided by the Client.

durationCancellation.title: Service Duration and Cancellation
durationCancellation.content:
â€¢ Duration: Services are provided for the contracted period (monthly, annual, or other), automatically renewing unless notified otherwise.

â€¢ Cancellation: The Client can cancel the service at any time from their account on the Website or by contacting support@hosthelperai.com. Cancellation will be effective at the end of the current billing period, without refunds for unused periods, unless otherwise indicated in applicable legislation.

withdrawalRight.title: Right of Withdrawal
withdrawalRight.content:
In accordance with LGDCU and the European Directive on Consumer Rights, the Client has the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 calendar days from service contracting, without need for justification, provided the service has not been completely executed.

To exercise this right:
â€¢ The Client must notify their decision through an unequivocal declaration sent to support@hosthelperai.com.
â€¢ HostHelperAI will refund the amount paid within 14 days from receiving the notification, using the same payment method employed by the Client.

Exception: The right of withdrawal does not apply if the service has been completely executed with the Client's express consent.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual and Industrial Property
intellectualProperty.content: All Website contents (texts, images, software, designs, trademarks, logos, etc.) and the services offered are property of HostHelperAI or its licensors. The User does not acquire any exploitation rights over said contents beyond what is necessary for using the Website and contracted services. Reproduction, distribution or modification of these contents without express authorization is prohibited.

warranties.title: Warranty Exclusion and Liability
warranties.content:
â€¢ HostHelperAI does not guarantee uninterrupted availability of the Website or services due to technical, maintenance or external causes beyond its control.

â€¢ HostHelperAI will not be liable for damages arising from:
  - Errors or omissions in contents.
  - Service interruptions due to technical causes or force majeure.
  - Improper use of the Website or services by the User.
  - Client data loss, except in cases of gross negligence by HostHelperAI.

â€¢ HostHelperAI implements reasonable security measures but does not guarantee total absence of viruses or harmful elements.

dataProtection.title: Personal Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
HostHelperAI processes personal data of Users and Clients in accordance with its Privacy Policy (available at www.hosthelperai.com). In summary:

â€¢ Data is collected to manage services, improve user experience and comply with legal obligations.
â€¢ Data will not be transferred to third parties except for legal obligation or with Client consent.
â€¢ Clients can exercise their rights of access, rectification, deletion, opposition, limitation and portability by contacting support@hosthelperai.com.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: The Website may include links to third-party sites (e.g., integrated platforms like Hostify). HostHelperAI does not exercise control over these sites and assumes no responsibility for their contents, privacy policies or availability.

exclusionRight.title: Right of Exclusion
exclusionRight.content: HostHelperAI reserves the right to deny or withdraw access to the Website and/or services, without prior notice, to those Users who breach these Terms or use the services improperly.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: HostHelperAI may modify these Terms at any time, publishing the updated version on the Website. Modifications will take effect from their publication, and Clients with active contracts will be notified by email. Continued use of the Website or services implies acceptance of the new Terms.

conflictResolution.title: Conflict Resolution
conflictResolution.content:
â€¢ Customer service: For any inquiry, complaint or claim, contact support@hosthelperai.com. We will respond within a maximum of 30 days.

â€¢ Extrajudicial resolution: Clients may resort to online conflict resolution platforms, such as the EU Online Dispute Resolution Platform (https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr).

â€¢ Jurisdiction: Any controversy arising from these Terms will be submitted to the competent courts of MÃ¡laga, Spain, unless applicable legislation provides another jurisdiction in favor of the consumer.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Legislation
applicableLaw.content:
These Terms are governed by Spanish legislation, particularly:

â€¢ Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR).
â€¢ Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce (LSSI).
â€¢ Royal Legislative Decree 1/2007, of November 16, approving the consolidated text of the General Law for Consumer and User Defense (LGDCU).
â€¢ Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5, on Personal Data Protection and guarantee of digital rights (LOPDGDD).

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any inquiry about these Terms, contact us at:

â€¢ Email: support@hosthelperai.com
â€¢ Postal address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga, Spain
â€¢ Phone: 687472327

contactSection.title: Have questions?
contactSection.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please don't hesitate to contact us:

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Procedure
dataDeletion.subtitle: How to exercise your right to be forgotten under GDPR

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Iterator dataworks sl (we, our), operating as www.hosthelperai.com, we are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union, including users' right to request deletion of their personal data (known as the right to be forgotten under Article 17 of GDPR). This document details how we manage personal data deletion requests to ensure transparency and regulatory compliance.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content:
Identity: ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L.

Tax ID: B22732358

Postal address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga, Spain

Phone: +34 687472327

Email: support@hosthelperai.com

deletionRights.title: Right to Data Deletion
deletionRights.content:
In accordance with Article 17 of GDPR, you have the right to request deletion of your personal data in the following cases:

â€¢ The data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or processed.

â€¢ You have withdrawn your consent for processing, and there is no other legal basis for its processing.

â€¢ You have objected to processing, and there are no overriding legitimate grounds to continue with it.

â€¢ The data has been processed unlawfully.

â€¢ The data must be deleted to comply with a legal obligation.

â€¢ The data was collected in relation to information society services offered to minors.

exceptions.title: Exceptions to the Right of Deletion
exceptions.content:
We may deny the deletion request if processing your data is necessary for:

â€¢ Exercising the right to freedom of expression and information.

â€¢ Complying with an applicable legal obligation, such as tax or accounting requirements.

â€¢ Archiving purposes in the public interest, scientific or historical research, or statistics, provided appropriate anonymization measures are applied.

â€¢ Establishing, exercising, or defending legal claims.

If we cannot comply with your deletion request due to one of these exceptions, we will inform you of the specific reasons in writing.

requestProcess.title: How to Request Data Deletion
requestProcess.content:
To exercise your right to data deletion, several methods are available:

**Method 1 - Direct Email Request:**
1. Send your request: Contact us by email at support@hosthelperai.com, clearly stating that you wish to exercise your right to data deletion.
2. Provide information: Include your full name, email address associated with our services, and any relevant details that help us identify your data (for example, customer ID or registered phone number).
3. Identity verification: To protect your privacy, we will ask you to verify your identity, usually through a copy of an official identity document (such as national ID or passport).
4. Confirmation: You will receive acknowledgment of your request within 72 hours.

**Method 2 - Apps with Facebook Login:**
If you accessed our services through Facebook Login, you can also request deletion:
1. Go to your Facebook account settings
2. Navigate to 'Apps and Websites'
3. Find Host Helper AI and remove the app
4. This will automatically send a data deletion request to our systems
5. You will receive a confirmation code to track the process

deletionProcess.title: Deletion Process
deletionProcess.content:
Once your request is received and verified:

1. Evaluation: We will review whether your request meets the criteria of Article 17 of GDPR and if any exception applies.

2. Data deletion: If the request is valid, we will delete your personal data from our active systems, databases, and any backups within a reasonable timeframe, generally not exceeding one month.

3. Third-party notification: If your data has been shared with third parties (for example, technology service providers such as cloud hosting services), we will notify them to also delete your data, unless this is impossible or involves disproportionate effort.

4. Confirmation: We will send you written confirmation once deletion has been completed or, if not possible, an explanation of the reasons.

confirmationCodes.title: Confirmation Codes and Tracking
confirmationCodes.content:
To provide transparency and comply with platform requirements such as Meta/Facebook, we implement a confirmation code system:

**What is a confirmation code?**
It is a unique alphanumeric identifier generated for each data deletion request, allowing you to track the status of the process.

**How to get your code?**
â€¢ Email requests: Included in the receipt confirmation
â€¢ Apps with Facebook Login: Provided automatically after the request
â€¢ Phone requests: Sent via confirmation email

**Status tracking:**
With your confirmation code you can check the status of your request and get a human-readable explanation of the progress. In the future, we will enable an online consultation page for greater convenience.

**Code example:** DEL-2025-ABC123XYZ

**Validity period:** Codes are valid throughout the deletion process and 90 additional days for subsequent inquiries.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.content: We will respond to your request within a maximum of one month from its receipt. In complex cases or with a high volume of requests, this period may be extended up to two additional months, in which case we will inform you of the extension and reasons within the first month.

technicalMeasures.title: Technical and Organizational Measures
technicalMeasures.content:
To ensure effective deletion of your data, we have implemented the following measures:

â€¢ Data identification: We use data management systems that allow us to locate and delete personal data efficiently.

â€¢ Secure deletion: We apply secure deletion techniques to ensure data cannot be recovered (for example, data overwriting in digital systems).

â€¢ Backup management: Data in backups is deleted in scheduled update cycles, ensuring it does not persist beyond what is necessary.

â€¢ Regular audits: We conduct periodic audits to verify compliance with our data deletion policies.

anonymizedData.title: Anonymized Data
anonymizedData.content: In some cases, we use aggregated and anonymized data derived from interactions with our services to train and improve our artificial intelligence models. This data does not identify you personally and is not subject to the right of deletion, as it is not considered personal data under GDPR.

dataProcessor.title: ITERATOR DATAWORKS S.L. as Data Processor
dataProcessor.content: When we act as Data Processor for our clients (for example, when processing data from their end users through our messaging services), we will forward any deletion requests received to the corresponding clients, who act as Data Controllers. We will comply with the Data Controller's instructions according to the Data Processing Agreement (DPA) signed, in compliance with Article 28 of GDPR.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any questions about this procedure or exercising your rights, contact us at:

Email: support@hosthelperai.com

Postal address: Avenida Imperio Argentina 7, portal 4, 4a, 29004 MÃ¡laga, Spain

If you are not satisfied with our response, you have the right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD) (www.aepd.es).

updates.title: Updates to this Procedure
updates.content: We reserve the right to update this procedure to reflect changes in regulations or our data processing practices. Changes will be published on our website www.hosthelperai.com, and we recommend reviewing it periodically.

action.title: Want to delete your data?
action.subtitle: Contact our team to start the data deletion process

deletionStatus.title: Data Deletion Status
deletionStatus.subtitle: Check the progress of your data deletion request using your confirmation code

searchForm.title: Check Request Status
searchForm.codeHelp: Enter the confirmation code you received by email or from Facebook

results.completedMessage: Your personal data has been successfully removed from our systems in accordance with GDPR Article 17.

whatIsCode.title: What is a confirmation code?
whatIsCode.content: It's a unique identifier that allows you to track the status of your data deletion request. It's automatically generated when creating the request.

howLong.title: How long does the process take?
howLong.content: The deletion process normally takes 7-30 business days, depending on the complexity and volume of data to be deleted.

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdprCompliance.content: This system complies with GDPR Article 17 (right to be forgotten) and provides complete transparency about the deletion process.

metaIntegration.title: Meta/Facebook Integration
metaIntegration.content: If you used Facebook Login, the code is automatically generated when you remove the app from Facebook settings.

errors.notFound: No request found with that confirmation code
